Official: Amy Lord beaten before fatal ride

Amy Lord was savagely beaten inside the South Boston building in which she lived before she was ordered into her Jeep by her attacker, a man who then forced her to drive to five Boston banks before murdering her and leaving her body in Hyde Park, an official said. (11:22 a.m.)
